revised_title: Annual Meeting and Election of Fellows in 1893
tldr: The Annual Meeting of the Royal Society took place on June 1, 1893, to elect new fellows. The Statutes were read, and Professor Lankester and Mr. Mond were nominated as Scrutators to help the Secretaries examine the lists. The following candidates were elected: Burnside, Dunstan, Ellis, Ewart, Gairdner, Hobson.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific community
